Forgot to add that the end result is Eclipse disappears from the screen but
stays in memory until the process is ended manually.
It looks like a job is running after shutdown...should this be possible?

This is definately possible - you should take care that the #shouldSchedule 
for a job returns false when you are shutdown (usually you need to cancel 
pending jobs too).

See WorkbenchJob for an example. Moving to PDE a they own this code.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 79310 ***
